snippet.title: PHYSICS
snippet.description: PHYSICS / Joe Incandela ; Roberto Tenchini ; Shahram Rahatlou ; Paris Sphicas There have been two plenary physics meetings since the December CMS week. The year started with two workshops, one on the measurements of the Standard Model necessary for “discovery physics” as well as one on the Physics Analysis Toolkit (PAT) [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2009-108.- \- Published in : , no. 1/2008, pp. 14
